How long would anyone say is a moment?
 Then, what all can happen in a moment's time?
 (I'm hoping that these questions are deep but not too deep to get answers.)

i figure a moment is not really a span of time, but more like a point in time. its like the still 3d image youd see if you pressed pause in life. that single image is a moment. you could say that most film is shot at 24 moments per second lol

I would say a moment is situated, it depends on the situation at hand. A moment is about as long as you expect someone to wait without being told the actual waiting time. If your friends are waiting for you in the pub, it could be as long as an hour. If your girlfriend is waiting for you to pass her the salt, it`s a few seconds...
 
 At least that`s my view.

...If your friends are waiting for you in the pub, it could be as long as an hour. If your girlfriend is waiting for you to pass her the salt, it`s a few seconds...

 By any chance, did you figure any of these out first hand. :p
